pages.text: I've been investigating that force for a long time , my $(4)mental condition was getting worse and worse$() , last night , I met a angel,He wants to make some $(9)deal$() with me . I even heard the $(4)devil laughing behind me$()...

pages.title: Charged Gunpowder
pages.text: I think I should talk about my $(e)recent findings$() . $(br)  I've brought $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/eroded_ender_pear)that ender pearl$() back for months , It doesn't seem willing to continue to erode , I mean that force . Maybe something $(ye)has restrained its ability$() . Let me check about that.

pages.title: Diary 12/2 846
pages.text: If my guess is right,It should be $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/charged_gun_powder)'strange gunpowder'$() that suppressed it , I keep them close . That gunpowder is full of energy , it looked like $(4)it was going to explode$() . I don't know how it works , I got it from a $(2)dead creeper$().
